game.title: The Missing Pendant
game.objective: Find the missing pendant of the Countess of Anhault.
game.description: The Countess of Anhault has lost her precious pendant, a symbol of her family's heritage. She is offering a generous reward to anyone who can find it.

task.objective: Talk to the servants in the castle to gather information about the pendant.
task.description: The servants may have seen or heard something that could help you find the pendant.

task.objective: Search the Countess's chambers for clues.
task.description: The pendant may be hidden in the Countess's chambers, or there may be clues to its whereabouts.

task.objective: Explore the castle grounds and nearby areas for any sign of the pendant.
task.description: The pendant may have been dropped or stolen and taken outside the castle walls.

task.objective: Return the pendant to the Countess.
task.description: Once you find the pendant, return it to the Countess to claim your reward.
